DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text field to indicate the agents used in the participant's previous smoking cessation regimen within the last five years.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe._A stopping.__A drug or medicine that treats or prevents or alleviates the symptoms of disease._Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.

Concepts.definition: The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.

Property.preferredDefinition: A stopping.:biologically active substance, including those intended for use in diagnosis, treatment, or prevention of disease or other abnormalities, for the relief of suffering, or control or improvement of a physical or mental state; includes biological products.:Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.

Concepts.definition: A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.
